item.title: Newport Gilded Age Mansions Trolley Tour with Breakers Admission
item.description: Discover the beauty of Newport, Rhode Island, and its historical mansions on a trolley tour that takes you past more than 150 points of interest along Ocean Drive, Bellevue Avenue, Cliff Walk, and more. Also included is admission to The Breakers, a Vanderbilt mansion and U.S. National Historic Landmark.

image.alt: Newport Gilded Age Mansions Trolley Tour with Breakers Admission

item.title: Afternoon Grand Tour | Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI
item.description: Take in Rhode Island’s scenic shoreline on a scenic sightseeing cruise through Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay. Aboard an open-air, fully restored lobster boat, enjoy a narrated tour as you pass Newport and Jamestown harbor fronts, and see landmarks like Fort Adams, Newport Bridge, and the famous Clingstone house. Your afternoon trip includes a Rhode Island-styled refreshment, as well as a cash bar.

image.alt: Afternoon Grand Tour | Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI

item.title: Newport Neighborhood Food Tour
item.description: Exploring Newport is even more fun on this Newport food walking tour, which introduces you to top Newport bites and city sights. Eat where the locals do at restaurants that are tucked away from the city’s main arteries—you might try locally sourced meats, Irish baked goods, or craft beer. As you walk between destinations, your guide shares stories about the city’s architecture and history. Upgrade to include alcoholic drinks as part of the tour.

image.alt: Newport Neighborhood Food Tour

item.title: Sunset Cruise with Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI
item.description: Discover Rhode Island’s beautiful coastline on this 60-minute evening cruise through Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay. Climb aboard the 50-foot restored lobster boat and listen to the guides share stories and history about the area. Sample some of the state’s cuisine—a quahog “stuffie—and enjoy one included beverage (beer, wine, specialty cocktails, or nonalcoholic beverage selections) and afterward you may purchase additional beverages.

image.alt: Sunset Cruise with Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI

item.title: Newport Walking Food And History Tour
item.description: Combine the history of a walking tour with the culture of a food tour on this Newport walking tour. As you make your way to five restaurants featuring top Newport culinary delights, your guide tells you about the city’s from before the American Revolution, through the Gilded Age, and up to the present.

image.alt: Newport Walking Food And History Tour

item.title: Scenic Bay Cruise of Narragansett Bay from Newport
item.description: Scenic Narragansett Bay isn’t just great for sailing—it’s the ideal vantage point for taking in the region’s best sights, beloved landmarks, and fascinating history. On this tour, you’ll hop aboard a 57-foot cruiser, nabbing panoramic views from your comfy seat. Your guide will detail 300+ years of history, from the Jamestown village to Fort Hamilton, Fort Wetherill State Park, Newport’s opulent harbor estates, the region’s vintage lighthouses, and more.

image.alt: Scenic Bay Cruise of Narragansett Bay from Newport

item.title: Lighthouse and Mimosa Cruise of Narragansett Bay from Newport
item.description: Newport, Rhode Island, is an absolute hotspot of history, and on this tour, you’ll get to experience the city’s wild past from the water. Sit back with a mimosa as your guide tells you the story of the region’s classic lighthouses, relays the tales behind the harbor mansions and churches, and dives behind the scenes of Fort Adams, Jamestown Village, Hammersmith Farm, and beyond.

image.alt: Lighthouse and Mimosa Cruise of Narragansett Bay from Newport

item.title: Morning Mimosa Cruise with Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI
item.description: Start your day right with this fun and informative cruise of Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay. You’ll sip a complimentary mimosa as you sail the sea with the help of an entertaining crew who’ll tell you all about the coastal history of the city. If you feel like having another drink, there’s also a cash bar and local favorites to try, like Del's Frozen Soft Lemonade and Yacht Club Soda.

image.alt: Morning Mimosa Cruise with Gansett Cruises in Newport, RI

item.title: Olde Town Ghost Walk
item.description: Learn about the history of Newport through the lore of its resident ghosts and ghouls with this tour of the town’s most haunted locations. Stroll past sites of gruesome crimes and other dark deeds and take in landmarks like White Horse Tavern, the Artillery Company of Newport, Trinity Church, and more. Listen to stories just scary enough to keep both adults and kids entertained as you explore Newport by night.

image.alt: Olde Town Ghost Walk

item.title: Private Newport, Rhode Island City Tour
item.description: Sailing regattas, Gilded Age mansions…Newport, Rhode Island, has quite the list of stories to tell (and secrets to reveal). Following your local guide—born and raised in Newport—you’ll dive head-first into cultural tales of America’s “First Resort,” learning about historic gems, social scandals, iconic spots, and more, getting a private, first-hand look at the “City-By-The-Sea.”

image.alt: Private Newport, Rhode Island City Tour

item.title: Newport Afternoon Sightseeing Sail on Classic Sailboat
item.description:
Sail on a classic sailboat in Newport, RI, and enjoy a sightseeing sailing experience around Narragansett Bay. Pass by many iconic sights during the sail, including Newport's historic lighthouses and landmarks, bridges, mansions and more! We'll even see Newport Bridge, New England's largest suspension bridge from the water.
Relax on deck of Schooner Madeleine, a beautiful classic sailboat, as the crew raises sail. Drinks are available for purchase onboard and guests are welcome to bring a snack.
This sightseeing sailing experience is great for locals and those visiting Newport in the spring, summer and fall.

image.alt: Newport Afternoon Sightseeing Sail on Classic Sailboat

item.title: Scenic Newport, RI Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Explore scenic Newport, Rhode Island at your own pace with this self-guided driving tour. Listen to enriching background on iconic historic mansions like the Bellevue House, the Elms, and the unmissable Vanderbilt estate known as The Breakers and visit public beaches and picturesque parks. Follow a live GPS map that works offline with customer support.

image.alt: Scenic Newport, RI Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Newport Sunset Sail on Schooner Adirondack
item.description: Join us aboard a classic sailboat for a 1.5-hour sunset sail in Newport! Sunset sailing is one of the best evening activities to do during your stay in Newport, RI. Enjoy a relaxing sail around Narragansett Bay on a classic sailboat and see all of Newport's iconic sights from the water including historic lighthouses and landmarks, other classic vessels, bridges, mansions, and more! We'll sail from historic downtown Newport and arrive back at the same meeting point.

image.alt: Newport Sunset Sail on Schooner Adirondack

item.title: Newport Cliff Walk Self-Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Explore scenic, Newport’s historic Cliff Walk at your own pace using this self-guided, GPS-based tour. Download an easy-to-use app and set off on an attraction-packed audio tour. Learn the little-known stories behind famous families of the Gilded Age—the Vanderbilts, the Astors, and other millionaires—and see their iconic oceanside mansions.

image.alt: Newport Cliff Walk Self-Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Walking Ghost Tour Through Newport RI
item.description: Walk Through History Wicked Awesome Tours of Newport is a tour company in Newport, Rhode Island. We educate visitors on the history of Newport; our city by the sea. Guests will view buildings from the 1600's, and hear true stories about pirates, British occupancy, and paranormal occurrences. We will not jump out and scare you. The tours will provide accurate historical facts and bring you to locations with a pirate connection and/or where people have reported experiencing strange phenomena.

image.alt: Walking Ghost Tour Through Newport RI

item.title: Newport Sightseeing Boat Tour aboard Rum Runner II
item.description: Step aboard a classic boat and get a great overview of Newport’s historic waterfront, Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay. This tour is fully narrated and includes passing by all the iconic sites Newport has to offer from the water. Sightsee along the shoreline, see some Newport mansions, see Fort Adams and some of the largest private yachts that summer in Newport.

image.alt: Newport Sightseeing Boat Tour aboard Rum Runner II

item.title: Newport Sightseeing Day Sailing Experience on Schooner Adirondack
item.description: See Newport, Rhode Island from the water on an exciting sunset sail around Newport Harbor on Schooner Adirondack. You'll pass by many iconic sights, bridges, lighthouses and more during this 1.5-hour experience!

image.alt: Newport Sightseeing Day Sailing Experience on Schooner Adirondack

item.title: Newport Ghosts: Seaside Hauntings and Hags Tour
item.description: Hear about Newport’s haunted history and lore during this ghost walking tour of the city, led by a guide who helps you easily and safely navigate Newport in the dark of night. From Washington Square to the neighborhood ferry, learn about a side of the city most tourists never see, while listening to some of the city’s best ghost stories.

image.alt: Newport Ghosts: Seaside Hauntings and Hags Tour

item.title: Newport Sunset Sail on Classic Sailboat
item.description: Sunset sailing is one of the best evening activities to do during your stay in Newport, RI. Enjoy a relaxing sail around Narragansett Bay on a classic sailboat and see all of Newport's iconic sights from the water including historic lighthouses and landmarks, other classic boats and sailboats, bridges, mansions and more!

image.alt: Newport Sunset Sail on Classic Sailboat

item.title: Historic Highlights with the Gilded Age Private Van Tour
item.description: Your private minivan tour will introduce you to Newport, Ri to discover more than 385 years of history. You will quickly see why Newport, RI. become the go-to summer destination for the Gilded Age crowd and Mrs. Astor's " 400." The Tour is Fully narrated along the 15 mile route, passing over 100 local attractions, points of Interest and Historic Sights. Keep in mind this is a private tour, for up to 5 guests, so we explore Newport, RI and all its amazing aspects at YOUR pace!

image.alt: Historic Highlights with the Gilded Age Private Van Tour

item.title: Scenic Tour of Newport, RI By Helicopter - 3 person Mansion Tour
item.description: Enjoy a 12-minute Mansion Tour of Newport, RI for groups up to 3 passengers. A truly unique perspective above the treasures of Newport awaits you on this tour. Take in captivating views of Aquidneck Island, Rose Island, the mighty Newport Bridge, and Ocean Drive. Soar over miles of the most beautiful coastline in the country. Enjoy breathtaking views of Rosecliff Mansion, Marble House, The Elms and many other famous residences. Get up close and personal with Hammersmith Farm, the Kennedy’s Newport summer home, and of course experience The Breakers, all from your front row seat in the sky.

image.alt: Scenic Tour of Newport, RI By Helicopter - 3 person Mansion Tour

item.title: Guided Tour of Newport in Open Air LSV
item.description: Experience Newport in style and comfort with our one-of-a-kind LSV tour. Enjoy the freedom and flexibility of exploring the city in a luxurious open-air electric vehicle while learning about its rich history from a knowledgeable local guide. Our personalized itineraries and intimate group size create a truly unforgettable experience.

image.alt: Guided Tour of Newport in Open Air LSV

item.title: Morning Mimosa Sightseeing Sail on Schooner Madeleine in Newport
item.description:
Start your day with a morning sightseeing sail around Newport on a classic sailboat. Sailing aboard Schooner Madeleine is a great experience for friends and family to see all the iconic waterfront sights of Newport and Narragansett Bay.
Sail by the Newport Bridge, which is the largest suspension bridge in New England, see historic lighthouses, Fort Adams, Newport's mansions, Hammersmith Farm and more from the water. Watch the crew raise sail and relax on deck with a mimosa.
Once the sails are up, guests will enjoy sailing around the bay powered by the wind. This is a classic Newport experience that's great for friends and family, locals and visitors that want to see all that Newport has to offer from the water!

image.alt: Morning Mimosa Sightseeing Sail on Schooner Madeleine in Newport

item.title: Ultimate Newport Self-Guided Bundle Tour
item.description: Visit historic, coastal Newport at your own pace during this attraction-packed, self-guided tour. Follow a carefully chosen itinerary and live GPS map, with stops at celebrated mansions like the Bellevue House, the chateau-inspired Elms, and the iconic Vanderbilt home, the Breakers, plus natural sights like Easton’s Beach and Fort Adams State Park.

image.alt: Ultimate Newport Self-Guided Bundle Tour
